title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7801.4 - Hours for public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7801.4 - Hours for public inspection

State Regulations

Requests for public access to records shall be accepted and
records shall be produced Monday through Friday, during regular business hours, 8:30 a.m.-4:45 p.m. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7801.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
